mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT sm.id,sm.parent_id,sm.menu_name,sm.path,sm.component,sm.visible,sm.type,sm.icon,sm.sort FROM sys_user_role AS sur LEFT JOIN sys_role AS sr ON sr.id=sur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu AS srm ON srm.role_id=sur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu AS sm ON sm.id=srm.menu_id WHERE sur.user_id=#{userid} AND sr.status=0 AND sm.status=0 AND sm.type != 2;

SELECT DISTINCT sm.perms FROM sys_user_role AS sur LEFT JOIN sys_role AS sr ON sr.id=sur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu AS srm ON srm.role_id=sur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu AS sm ON sm.id=srm.menu_id WHERE sur.user_id=#{userid} AND sr.status=0 AND sm.status=0 AND sm.type != 0;
SELECT sm.id, sm.parent_id, sm.menu_name, sm.path, sm.component, sm.status, sm.visible, sm.type, sm.icon, sm.sort, sm.perms FROM sys_menu as sm WHERE del_flag=0 ORDER BY sm.sort
SELECT sm.id, sm.parent_id, sm.menu_name, sm.visible, sm.type, sm.sort FROM sys_menu as sm WHERE del_flag = 0 AND sm.status = 0 AND sm.visible = 0 ORDER BY sm.sort
SELECT * FROM sys_menu WHERE type = 0 AND status = 0 AND del_flag = 0 ORDER BY sort
SELECT * FROM sys_menu WHERE type = 1 AND status = 0 AND del_flag = 0 ORDER BY sort

SELECT DISTINCT sm.path,sm.component FROM sys_user_role AS sur LEFT JOIN sys_role AS sr ON sr.id=sur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu AS srm ON srm.role_id=sur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu AS sm ON sm.id=srm.menu_id WHERE sur.user_id=#{userid} AND sr.status=0 AND sm.status=0 AND sm.type =1;
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_menu SET parent_id=#{parentId}, menu_name=#{menuName}, path=#{path}, component=#{component}, status=#{status}, visible=#{visible}, perms=#{perms}, type=#{type}, icon=#{icon}, update_time=#{updateTime}, sort=#{sort}, remark=#{remark} WHERE id=#{id}
